user.title: AccuWeather
user.description:
If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/bieniu/ha-accuweather 

 Some sensors are not enabled by default. You can enable them in the entity registry after the integration configuration.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of AccuWeather is allowed.

user.title: AccuWeather Options
user.description: Due to the limitations of the free version of the AccuWeather API key, when you enable weather forecast get, data updates will be performed every 60 minutes instead of every 30 minutes.
